title: March Madness 2025: How to Watch Florida vs. Houston in the Men’s National Championship Online
description: March Madness 2025 ends tonight. Here is everything you need to know for watching the Florida vs. Houston men’s championship basketball game online. Men’s National Championship: Where to Watch Florida vs. Houston Online The Florida vs. Houston game vying for the NCAA men’s basketball national title will tip off Monday, April 7 at 8:50 pm […]
author: Claire Franken
excerpt: March Madness is coming to an end. Here's how to watch Florida vs. Houston in the 2025 NCAA men's national championship game online.
text: All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, TVLine may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes. March Madness 2025 ends tonight. Here is everything you need to know for watching the Florida vs. Houston men’s championship basketball game online. How to Watch 2025 Men’s National Championship Online The Florida vs. Houston game vying for the NCAA men’s basketball national title will tip off Monday, April 7 at 8:50 pm ET. The game will be televised on CBS and livestreamed on Paramount Plus. If you’re hoping to catch all the action between the Gators and the Cougars, you’ll need access to Paramount Plus or your local CBS channel. Below, we’re outlining all the ways to livestream the big game. (Note: CBS is only available in select markets. Always confirm that your area is eligible for CBS before signing up for a live-TV streaming service.) Where to Watch Florida vs. Houston Online: Paramount Plus Courtesy of Paramount+ The best way to livestream the Florida vs. Houston online is by signing up for Paramount Plus With Showtime. The 2025 men’s championship basketball game will stream live for subscribers to this premium plan only! The ad-free Paramount Plus With Showtime plan, goes for $12.99/month, which includes your local live CBS station. This is the cheapest way to watch the game live online. Where to Watch Florida vs. Houston Online: Sling TV Courtesy of Sling TV Sling TV does not offer CBS, but in celebration of March Madness, customers can now watch all CBS games through the March Madness Live app by using their Sling login credentials. Sling plans start at $45.99/month. Where to Watch Florida vs. Houston Online: DirecTV Stream Courtesy of DirecTVDirecTV StreamOn Sale 22% off DirecTV Stream offers a five-day free trial and a few different subscription options for a variety of prices so you can choose whichever fits your budget. The Choice package is the most popular and offers CBS in select markets in addition to over 100 other channels for $114.99/month. Where to Watch Florida vs. Houston Online: Fubo TV Fubo is another way to watch the Florida vs. Houston game online for free thanks to its seven-day free trial. Fubo’s Pro plan grants subscribers access to CBS in certain markets. Plus, Fubo is offering $20 off its plans, bringing the price down to $74.99/month. And for that price, you not only get access to CBS, but also can watch over 175 other channels. More good news? You can cancel and change your subscription at any time, making Fubo an easy and low-commitment way for watching the 2025 men’s championship online for free. Where to Watch Florida vs. Houston Online:: Hulu + Live TV Courtesy of Hulu The Hulu + Live TV subscription is a more expensive option for watching the basketball game without cable, ringing in at $82.99/month. With that being said, you get a lot of content with this bundle subscription. You gain access to the Hulu streaming library, CBS, ESPN+ and Disney+. This is a comprehensive packing for addressing all you cord-cutter needs. When Is the 2025 Men’s NCAA March Madness Championship Game? Date, Start Time, Channel The men’s championship game between No. 1 Florida and No. 1 Houston will tip off at 8:50 pm ET on Monday, April 7. The game will be televised on CBS and livestream on Paramount Plus. Where Is the 2025 NCAA Men’s March Madness Championship Game Played? The 2025 men’s championship game will be played at the Alamodome in San Antonio, Texas. Florida vs. Houston National Championship Game Odds, Predictions BetMGM is favoring Florida for the win with a slight advantage in a -1.5-point spread. ESPN’s Matchup Predictor, however, favors Houston with a 65.5% chance of winning.
html:
All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, TVLine may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes.

March Madness 2025 ends tonight. Here is everything you need to know for watching the Florida vs. Houston men’s championship basketball game online.

How to Watch 2025 Men’s National Championship Online

The Florida vs. Houston game vying for the NCAA men’s basketball national title will tip off Monday, April 7 at 8:50 pm ET. The game will be televised on CBS and livestreamed on Paramount Plus. If you’re hoping to catch all the action between the Gators and the Cougars, you’ll need access to Paramount Plus or your local CBS channel. Below, we’re outlining all the ways to livestream the big game.

(Note: CBS is only available in select markets. Always confirm that your area is eligible for CBS before signing up for a live-TV streaming service.)

Where to Watch Florida vs. Houston Online: Paramount Plus

The best way to livestream the Florida vs. Houston online is by signing up for Paramount Plus With Showtime. The 2025 men’s championship basketball game will stream live for subscribers to this premium plan only! The ad-free Paramount Plus With Showtime plan, goes for $12.99/month, which includes your local live CBS station. This is the cheapest way to watch the game live online.

Where to Watch Florida vs. Houston Online: Sling TV

Sling TV does not offer CBS, but in celebration of March Madness, customers can now watch all CBS games through the March Madness Live app by using their Sling login credentials. Sling plans start at $45.99/month.

Where to Watch Florida vs. Houston Online: DirecTV Stream

DirecTV Stream

On Sale 22% off

DirecTV Stream offers a five-day free trial and a few different subscription options for a variety of prices so you can choose whichever fits your budget. The Choice package is the most popular and offers CBS in select markets in addition to over 100 other channels for $114.99/month.

Where to Watch Florida vs. Houston Online: Fubo TV

Fubo is another way to watch the Florida vs. Houston game online for free thanks to its seven-day free trial. Fubo’s Pro plan grants subscribers access to CBS in certain markets. Plus, Fubo is offering $20 off its plans, bringing the price down to $74.99/month. And for that price, you not only get access to CBS, but also can watch over 175 other channels. More good news? You can cancel and change your subscription at any time, making Fubo an easy and low-commitment way for watching the 2025 men’s championship online for free.

Where to Watch Florida vs. Houston Online:: Hulu + Live TV

The Hulu + Live TV subscription is a more expensive option for watching the basketball game without cable, ringing in at $82.99/month. With that being said, you get a lot of content with this bundle subscription. You gain access to the Hulu streaming library, CBS, ESPN+ and Disney+. This is a comprehensive packing for addressing all you cord-cutter needs.

When Is the 2025 Men’s NCAA March Madness Championship Game? Date, Start Time, Channel

The men’s championship game between No. 1 Florida and No. 1 Houston will tip off at 8:50 pm ET on Monday, April 7. The game will be televised on CBS and livestream on Paramount Plus.

Where Is the 2025 NCAA Men’s March Madness Championship Game Played?

The 2025 men’s championship game will be played at the Alamodome in San Antonio, Texas.

Florida vs. Houston National Championship Game Odds, Predictions

BetMGM is favoring Florida for the win with a slight advantage in a -1.5-point spread. ESPN’s Matchup Predictor, however, favors Houston with a 65.5% chance of winning.
